item.title: UW Debate Vlog — Panama WUDC 2025
item.description: The University of Waterloo Debate Society had the incredible opportunity of competing at the Panama World Universities Debating Championship 2025.

item.title: Defending the Title at Léger Cup 2025 & What Debate Means To Me
item.description: Prologue # During the past weekend, I went to compete at the Léger Cup 2025.

item.title: UW Debate Vlog — Vietnam WUDC 2024
item.description: I spent the winter break in Vietnam competing at the World Universities Debating Championship 2024, and also filmed a vlog for it!

item.title: 2A — Random Life Updates
item.description: How we spend our days is, of course, how we spend our lives.

item.title: Waterloo Debate Vlog — McGill Central Canadian Novice Championship 2023
item.description: Last weekend, The UW Debate Society went to McGill Canadian Central Novice Championship 2023 and had a great time!
